content: lion brand pattern # 50324 *chs-5panelthrow pdf* published in simply creative crochet skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 4 colors 8 balls total *sierra rococo barley fawn* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge 10 double_crochet = 4 in 10 cm square = 8 in x 8 in 20 5 x 20 5 cm work 3 panels double_crochet and 14 granny squares 8 different color sequences are provided sew throw together following construction diagram crochet border to finish *free registration at site required to access pattern *
